Text: REB NonPrivilegedpst Richard Thanks for thinking of us I was at ground zero saw the whole thing and escaped in the nick of time There are obviously a lot of emotional consequences but Ill give you the basics On Wednesday we learned incorrectly that our building had collapsed or was about to At that point we all decided we might never return and that our mission was to obtain new space and to resume our operations as soon as possible Last Thursday we took new space at Rockefeller Plaza and ordered all new computer systems Friday we got hold of the computers and over the weekend they were installed By Monday we were had phones and computers and we were up and running Now we just need to get our documents out of Liberty and we are not sure when that will happen We had a tremendous amount of help and offers of assistance all of which we greatly appreciate My information appears below My fax is Lets talk soon Steve Steven R Schindler Schindler Cohen Hochman LLP Rockefeller Plaza th Floor New York NY Original Message From Sanders Richard B mailtoRichardB NRONcom Sent Wednesday September AM To Steven Schindler Subject I tried to call you but the phones are out No urgency I just remember your proximity to the WTC and wanted to make sure you and the members of your firm are OK This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
